info.title: ApiManagementClient
info.description: Use these REST APIs for performing operations on Certificate entity in your Azure API Management deployment. Certificates can be used to setup mutual authentication with your Backend in API Management. For more information refer to [How to secure backend using Mutual Auth Certificate](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/api-management/api-management-howto-mutual-certificates).

parameters.name: If-Match
parameters.description: The entity state (Etag) version of the certificate to delete. A value of "*" can be used for If-Match to unconditionally apply the operation.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

ApiManagementDeleteCertificate.request:
DELETE https://management.azure.com/subscriptions/subid/resourceGroups/rg1/providers/Microsoft.ApiManagement/service/apimService1/certificates/tempcert?api-version=2017-03-01 HTTP/1.1
Authorization: Bearer <token>
If-Match: *
Content-Type: application/json
accept-language: en-US
x-ms-client-request-id: b473feeb-60e9-4c01-923d-e38af7893e7c
host: management.azure.com
Connection: close
ApiManagementDeleteCertificate.curl:
curl -X DELETE 'https://management.azure.com/subscriptions/subid/resourceGroups/rg1/providers/Microsoft.ApiManagement/service/apimService1/certificates/tempcert?api-version=2017-03-01' \
-H 'authorization: bearer <token>' \
-H 'If-Match: *' \
-H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
-H 'accept-language: en-US' \
-H 'x-ms-client-request-id: b473feeb-60e9-4c01-923d-e38af7893e7c' \

response.204:
HTTP 1.1 204
Cache-Control: no-cache
Pragma: no-cache
Expires: -1
x-ms-ratelimit-remaining-subscription-writes: 1199
x-ms-request-id: 1588e9d2-b8f2-479c-b3bd-d3439ea2f5a9
x-ms-correlation-request-id: 1588e9d2-b8f2-479c-b3bd-d3439ea2f5a9
x-ms-routing-request-id: WESTUS2:20170904T092735616Z:1588e9d2-b8f2-479c-b3bd-d3439ea2f5a9
Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=31536000; includeSubDomains
content-type: application/json
Date: Mon, 04 Sep 2017 09:27:35 GMT
Connection: close

expirationDate.description: Expiration date of the certificate. The date conforms to the following format: `yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ` as specified by the ISO 8601 standard.

properties.description: Certificate create or update properties details.

data.description: Base 64 encoded certificate using the application/x-pkcs12 representation.

CertificateCreateOrUpdateProperties.description: Parameters supplied to the CreateOrUpdate certificate operation.

policyContent.description: Xml Encoded contents of the Policy.

type.description: Resource type for API Management resource.

code.description: Service-defined error code. This code serves as a sub-status for the HTTP error code specified in the response.

details.description: The list of invalid fields send in request, in case of validation error.

CertificateIdParameter.name: certificateId
CertificateIdParameter.description: Identifier of the certificate entity. Must be unique in the current API Management service instance.

SubscriptionIdParameter.name: subscriptionId
SubscriptionIdParameter.description: Subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

ApiVersionParameter.name: api-version
ApiVersionParameter.description: Version of the API to be used with the client request.

ServiceNameParameter.name: serviceName
ServiceNameParameter.description: The name of the API Management service.

ResourceGroupNameParameter.name: resourceGroupName
ResourceGroupNameParameter.description: The name of the resource group.
